TopicTitle: (STREAMING MUN MISSION) Raising Money for Charity! (donating $1 per 10 followers)

Articles.Content:
I will be donating $1 for every 10 followers my Twitch channel receives (up to 100 followers) to Child's Play Charity. Child's Play Charity is an organization dedicated to improving the lives of children with toys and games in our network of over 70 hospitals worldwide. Source: http://www.childsplaycharity.org/about

About my stream: I am currently streaming KSP on weekends and on weekdays as much as possible. You can find more info in my signature. I also play games such as Rust and Beamng Drive (although I mainly stream KSP).

My twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/cupojoepro

Edited February 1, 2014 by Cupojoepro
I will be streaming KSP for roughly 45 minutes right now! http://www.twitch.tv/cupojoepro
